Wardrobe review

Wardrobe analysis always takes place in different ways. It all depends on your goals and objectives. A new wardrobe can be created almost from scratch, leaving only some elements of clothing from the old one. Or you can make a shopping list and buy a little more to add new notes.

How does the consultation work?

  • We decide on goals - what we want to get in the end, for what occasions clothes and in what style
  • We discuss and evaluate every item. It should suit you in color, style and style
  • We alter and repair what is possible and, if it makes sense, we breathe new life into our favorite things (for example, a skirt of very good quality and color, but it is too big for you - we sew it in and wear it for your health)
  • Remove unnecessary things from the closet. What does not decorate you, does not fit, does not suit you in color and style
  • I show you how to organize space in your closet to make it convenient and functional

What are you getting?

  • Tips on how to combine things. You will see your things in a new way - from the outside
  • A shopping list that you need to create a “smart” wardrobe, in which all things are combined with each other and you can make many sets from them
  • A smile in the morning, because now there will always be something to wear

Duration - 2 hours. 100€
If necessary, the next hour is 50€
